job_details.Functieomschrijving: ?  * Social media & AI verbinden - Je gebruikt social API's (Meta, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, Reddit, LinkedIn) om data te verzamelen, analyseren en slim te gebruiken in AI-modellen.  * AI-gestuurde content & insights genereren - Je ontwikkelt systemen die automatisch captions, visuals en video's creëren op basis van trending topics en merkdata.
job_details.full_text:
Generative AI Engineer

?  * Social media & AI verbinden - Je gebruikt social API's (Meta, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, Reddit, LinkedIn) om data te verzamelen, analyseren en slim te gebruiken in AI-modellen.  * AI-gestuurde content & insights genereren - Je ontwikkelt systemen die automatisch captions, visuals en video's creëren op basis van trending topics en merkdata.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building systems that generate content (captions, visuals, videos) using AI models, directly aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer. It also mentions connecting social media APIs for data collection and analysis to feed into these AI models, and developing AI-driven content generation systems. This focus on generative techniques and building applications around them, rather than purely predictive modeling or data engineering, points to the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Je gebruikt social API's (Meta, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, Reddit, LinkedIn) om data te verzamelen, analyseren en slim te gebruiken in AI-modellen' implies the development of software to interact with external APIs for data collection and integration into AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Je gebruikt social API's (Meta, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, Reddit, LinkedIn) om data te verzamelen, analyseren en slim te gebruiken in AI-modellen

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'slim te gebruiken in AI-modellen' indicates the application and utilization of AI models.
The phrase 'AI-gestuurde content & insights genereren' directly points to the use and development of generative AI models for content creation.
The phrase 'Je ontwikkelt systemen die automatisch captions, visuals en video's creëren' describes the development of software systems to automate content generation.
job_tasks.phrase: Je ontwikkelt systemen die automatisch captions, visuals en video's creëren

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'op basis van trending topics en merkdata' suggests an understanding of business context and market trends to inform AI-driven content generation.
job_tasks.phrase: op basis van trending topics en merkdata
